rooms.title: Configure Rooms
rooms.description: Add rooms to control. You can add multiple rooms.

data.room_name_description: A friendly name for this room (e.g., 'Master Bedroom', 'Living Room')
data.climate_entity_description: The climate entity that controls this room's temperature target (e.g., climate.master_bedroom_room)
data.temp_sensor_description: Optional temperature sensor for this room. If not provided, uses the climate entity's current temperature.
data.occupancy_sensor_description: Optional binary sensor that indicates if the room is occupied (e.g., binary_sensor.master_occupied_recent)
data.vent_entities_description: Select one or more vent cover entities for this room (e.g., cover.master_bedroom_v1_vent)
data.priority_description: Priority for relief vent selection. Higher priority rooms are preferred when opening relief vents. Default: 5
data.add_another_description: Check this box to add another room after saving this one

settings.title: Configure Settings
settings.description: Adjust thresholds and protection settings for the Smart Vent Controller

data.min_other_room_open_pct_description: Minimum percentage that non-selected rooms' vents stay open. Prevents over-closing vents. Default: 20%
data.closed_threshold_pct_description: Vent position below this percentage is considered 'closed' for relief calculations. Default: 10%
data.relief_open_pct_description: Percentage to open relief vents when needed. Higher values provide more airflow. Default: 60%
data.max_relief_rooms_description: Maximum number of rooms to open as relief vents simultaneously. Default: 3
data.room_hysteresis_f_description: Temperature difference threshold before a room is considered needing conditioning. Prevents rapid cycling. Default: 1.0°F
data.hvac_min_runtime_min_description: Minimum time the HVAC must run before it can be turned off. Prevents short cycling. Default: 10 min
data.hvac_min_off_time_min_description: Minimum time the HVAC must be off before it can turn on again. Prevents short cycling. Default: 5 min
data.occupancy_linger_min_description: How long a room is considered 'occupied' after occupancy sensor turns off (daytime). Default: 30 min
data.occupancy_linger_night_min_description: How long a room is considered 'occupied' after occupancy sensor turns off (nighttime). Default: 60 min
data.heat_boost_f_description: Additional temperature to add to heating setpoint for faster warm-up. Only applies if Heat Boost Enabled is on. Default: 1.0°F
data.default_thermostat_temp_description: Default temperature to set thermostat when no rooms need conditioning. Default: 72°F
data.automation_cooldown_sec_description: Minimum seconds between automation triggers. Prevents rapid re-triggering. Default: 30 sec
data.require_occupancy_description: Only condition rooms that are currently occupied or recently occupied (within linger time). Default: On
data.heat_boost_enabled_description: Enable heat boost feature to add extra temperature during heating cycles. Default: On
data.auto_thermostat_control_description: Allow integration to automatically adjust thermostat setpoint. If disabled, only vent control is active. Default: On
data.auto_vent_control_description: Allow integration to automatically adjust vent positions. If disabled, only thermostat control is active. Default: On
data.debug_mode_description: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Check Home Assistant logs for debug messages. Default: Off

error.no_climate_entities: No climate entities found. Please add a climate entity first.
error.no_rooms: At least one room must be configured
